snippet.title: Mozart's the Magic Flute: Die Zauberflote \- Page 22
snippet.description: he Magic Flute has become one ofthe most popular operas in the repertory for over two centuries: it is a magical story possessing many arcane and exciting secrets, and a story whose characters have become household names.

snippet.title: The Magic Flute
snippet.description: Brought to life with glorious illustrations, this enchanting retelling of Mozart's famous opera is sure to delight lovers of fairy tales and music alike.

snippet.title: The Magic Flute
snippet.description: Although the tale is fantasy, there are serious elements in this story. To listen to the music of The Magic Flute is an exciting and magical journey. This is a story that can be read on many levels and enjoyed by all.
